title: Data Science Fundamentals
description: Test your knowledge of data science concepts.

questions.questionText: Which library is used for data manipulation in Python?
Write a Python function to calculate the mean of a list.
What do you observe in the given image?
questions.correctAnswer: The image depicts a scatter plot showing a positive correlation.

questions.questionText: What trend do you observe in the sales data?
questions.correctAnswer: The sales trend shows a consistent increase, indicating growth.
